医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
重大的全球心血管风险与高脂蛋白（a）水平有关《柳叶刀》的评论发现，全球五分之一的人面临患心血管疾病的风险，因为他们携带高水平特定脂蛋白的遗传风险，这种脂蛋白可以进行检测并可能进行治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Significant-global-cardiovian-risk-linked-to-high-lipo Protein(a)-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Significant-global-cardioangio-risk-linked-to-high-lipo Protein(a)-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5561cdcf-5625-4a2f-b141-a4316ad1d506 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 22:33:09 -0400 Significant global cardiovascular risk linked to high lipoprotein(a) levels
GLP-2 通过影响肠脑通讯和胃肠道运动来调节食欲研究人员通过 GLP-2 对胃肠道运动和饱腹感信号的影响来研究 GLP-2 在调节食物摄入中的作用，从而为潜在的肥胖治疗提供见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/GLP-2-regulates-appetite-by-influencing-gut-brain-communication-and-胃肠动力.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/GLP-2-regulates-appetite-by-influencing-gut-brain-communication-and-cancer-motility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97e2e97f-cfc6-4282-9d7e-de4b9e5ee7f5 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 22:30:00 -0400 GLP-2 regulates appetite by influencing gut-brain communication and gastrointestinal motility
尽管存在病毒 DNA，研究人员没有发现宠物感染猴痘的证据研究发现，受 MPOX 影响的家庭中宠物身上的 MPXV DNA 很可能是由于人类污染，而不是真正的感染，因为没有检测到活病毒或抗体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Researchers-find-no-evidence-of-monkeypox-infection-in-pets-despite-presence-of-viral-DNA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Researchers-find-no-evidence-of-monkeypox-infection-in-pets-despite-presence-of-viral-DNA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=594a2d17-88bd-4166-a7af-aac17e026c92 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 21:46:00 -0400 Researchers find no evidence of monkeypox infection in pets, despite presence of viral DNA
研究显示哥伦比亚年轻女性吸毒过量人数显着增加哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院的一项研究显示，2018 年至 2021 年期间，哥伦比亚涉及非法阿片类药物、致幻剂、兴奋剂和镇静精神药物的过量服用率大幅增加，主要是由年轻女性过量服用造成的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Study-reveals-significant-increase-in-drug-overdoses-in-Colombia-among-young-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Study-reveals-significant-increase-in-drug-overdoses-in-Colombia-among-young-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3a01188-87f4-4946-a73d-3c96ab82ead6 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 21:28:00 -0400 Study reveals significant increase in drug overdoses in Colombia among young women
发现与早期更年期和癌症风险相关的新基因变异研究揭示了九种与卵巢衰老和癌症风险相关的基因变异，对生殖寿命和从头突变率有影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-gene-variants-linked-to-early-menopause-and-cancer-risk-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-gene-variants-linked-to-early-menopause-and-cancer-risk-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94b16c95-e385-4f12-ad45-5c546b7c04cf Thu, 12 Sep 2024 21:22:00 -0400 New gene variants linked to early menopause and cancer risk identified
新联盟解决神经发育和精神疾病的遗传起源包括精神分裂症、双相情感障碍、自闭症和抑郁症在内的神经发育和精神疾病（NPD）对个人、家庭和整个社会都有害，并且在许多情况下仍然缺乏有效的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-consortium-tackles-genic-origins-of-neurodevelopmental-and-psychiatric-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/New-consortium-tackles-genic-origins-of-neurodevelopmental-and-psychiatric-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=562ad2b4-58a6-45a6-9d17-6a7365218b7e Thu, 12 Sep 2024 21:17:58 -0400 New consortium tackles genetic origins of neurodevelopmental and psychiatric disorders
研究显示，COVID-19 疫苗避免了拉丁美洲和加勒比地区数百万人的死亡研究人员估计，从 2021 年初到 2022 年 5 月，COVID-19 疫苗在部分拉丁美洲和加勒比国家避免了 61 万至 262 万人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/COVID-19-vaccines-prevented-millions-of-deaths-across-Latin-America-and-the-Caribbean-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/COVID-19-vaccines-prevented-millions-of-deaths-across-Latin-America-and-the-Caribbean-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9de2c71-e28f-4ed9-aa8f-dc19ab325b7b Thu, 12 Sep 2024 21:02:00 -0400 COVID-19 vaccines prevented millions of deaths across Latin America and the Caribbean, study shows
24 小时和 15 小时氧疗的健康结果没有差异每天 24 小时在家接受氧疗的肺病患者和低血氧患者组与接受相同治疗的组患者在生活质量、症状、入院率或死亡率方面没有差异根据瑞典隆德大学的一项研究，每天工作 15 个小时。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/No-difference-in-health-outcomes- Between-24-hour-and-15-hour-oxygen-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/No-difference-in-health-outcomes- Between-24-hour-and-15-hour-oxygen-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df0ea96a-83e4-4a60-ae5f-1f081688a506 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 20:47:06 -0400 No difference in health outcomes between 24-hour and 15-hour oxygen therapy
大麻二酚在治疗认知障碍方面显示出前景研究回顾了大麻二酚（CBD）在治疗认知障碍方面的治疗潜力，强调了一些试验的积极作用，同时强调需要进行更全面的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Cannabidiol-shows-promise-in-treating-cognitive-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Cannabidiol-shows-promise-in-treating-cognitive-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb5f4ab8-2d96-40e3-ad3f-e32e5cf9dc6f Thu, 12 Sep 2024 20:37:00 -0400 Cannabidiol shows promise in treating cognitive disorders
冰河时代青少年经历的青春期阶段与现代青少年相似具有里程碑意义的新研究表明，25,000 年前的冰河时代青少年经历了与现代青少年相似的青春期阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Ice-Age-teens-experienced-puberty-stages-similar-to-modern-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Ice-Age-teens-experienced-puberty-stages-similar-to-modern-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53104e81-82eb-4783-8a1e-1007ae0349dd Thu, 12 Sep 2024 20:36:46 -0400 Ice Age teens experienced puberty stages similar to modern adolescents
